stem: Given question: Joe bought a bunch of grapes because he likes to use them to top his what? and answer: deserts, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Grapes are sometimes a topping for desserts, e.g., fruit tarts.
150_to_200_words: Joe likes to buy grapes to top his deserts because they are a sweet, tart, and juicy addition to a variety of desserts. They add flavor and texture to many types of cakes, pies, cobblers, and crisps. Grapes also give desserts a beautiful pop of color, making them more visually appealing. Since grapes are so versatile, Joe can use them to top almost any kind of dessert he makes. Grapes can be used fresh, frozen, or even dried. This gives Joe a lot of options when it comes to topping his desserts. He can add a few fresh grapes to the top of a cake, or he can sprinkle a few dried grapes over a pie. Joe can also use frozen grapes to create a sweet and tart ice cream topping. No matter which way he uses them, grapes always add a fun and delicious finishing touch to any dessert.
